about.desc1: Hey there! 👋 I'm David Lucca, a 21-year-old Brazilian taking on the tech scene while soaking up the awesome vibes of Portugal.
about.desc2: I'm all about crafting cool web experiences that make a statement. When I'm not lost in lines of code, catch me exploring virtual realms 🎮 or vibing to a mix of tunes 🎧. And you know what? I'm all about those deep, moody tones – they just vibe with my aesthetic choices ⚫.
about.desc3: Wondering about my guiding principle? It's all about working hard 💪, staying determined 💡, and diving into coding challenges like they're thrilling adventures 🚀. With solid communication 🗣️ and a knack for problem-solving 🧩, I'm eager to make my mark in the tech world.

portfolio.title: Jobs and Projects
portfolio.marques_jr_desc: The Marques Jr. barbershop application is developed using React, providing a user-friendly interface for customers to book appointments and explore services. It's made responsive with Tailwind CSS, ensuring seamless functionality across various devices.
portfolio.kampus_desc: Kampus is a web app transforming campus management, simplifying student and staff tasks. It enhances onboarding and daily campus life with organizational tools.
portfolio.pokedex_desc: A Single Page Application with React, featuring multiple views. The React app seamlessly interacts with a mock backend and an external API, handling all CRUD operations on the backend.
portfolio.mario_breakout_desc: A game that puts a Mario twist on the classic 'Breakout.' It's addictive and straightforward: you maneuver a platform to bounce a ball, breaking blocks until they're all gone.
